question.title: Java Swing automation with Squish works for simple flows but fails on deeper navigation
question.body: I’m automating a Linux-based Java Swing application using Squish for Java 9.1.1 on a VirtualBox VM. Automation works for simple flows, but after navigating 3–4 pages the app intermittently shows a grey/blank screen, redirects to home, or stops responding—while manual runs work fine. Are there known Squish issues or best practices for handling deeper/dynamic UI flows in Java Swing applications?
